trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Hartford
There were no other sightings in Hartford on or around June 15th 2005
divs: Sighting DetailsI saw a silver tentecled object flying at high speed over my feild day area.I informed my friend of the object,which dissapered after. I spotted the UFO by casualy glaceing up. I first thought the object was hallutionasion;trick of the light. Looking up again I learned it wasnt a hallutionasion it was a UFO. Four or five tentecles trailed behind it. I was terified at the sight. Sadly nobody belived my story. It hovered for a second and flew away.
